title: Covaxin side - effects : Period - related abnormalities , musculoskeletal disorders reported
body_text:
Covaxin side-effects: Period-related abnormalities, musculoskeletal disorders reported
A recent study showed that a considerable proportion of individuals who received Covaxin experienced adverse effects, particularly in female adolescents and those with allergies. These effects were found to persist even after a year, with respiratory and skin issues being the most common. The researchers stress the importance of continued monitoring to identify potential long-term adverse events.
